translation.en: So I'll just chalk it up to insanity.
Okay.
However, I would like you to leave.
translation.it: Però vorrei che te ne andassi.

translation.en: Okay, I will see myself out.
I am not holding these anymore. Carpal tunnel.
translation.it: Questo non lo tengo più. Tunnel carpale.

translation.en: -Let's go. -Don't touch me.
I'll take those, darling.
Father? Now, can we skip to the end, please?
translation.it: Padre, possiamo andare direttamente alla fine?

translation.en: All right, then.
I now pronounce you husband and wife!
We're married! We're married!
-We're married! -We're married!
I'm gonna get it, though. Hey, baby. How you doing, man?
translation.it: Sono sposato. Ehi, tesoro. Come va, amico?

translation.en: -Come on and see me, now. -I will, man.
translation.it: - Vieni presto a trovarmi. - Lo farò, amico.

translation.en: Hey, baby.
You look pretty. I like that you dressed for the occasion.
translation.it: Sei carina. Mi fa piacere che ti sia messa elegante.

translation.en: Thank you for having us.
-You must be Mrs. Right. -Yes.
translation.it: - E tu sei quella giusta. - Sì.

translation.en: You're a vision, beautiful. That's for her.
-Nice. -Rob, who are all these people?
Oh, its just a few friends I met on the way to the wedding.
translation.it: Degli amici che ho incontrato mentre venivo a sposarmi.

translation.en: And how did you get Brian McKnight to show up?
translation.it: Come hai fatto a far venire Brian McKnight?

translation.en: You ain't gonna believe it.
I actually helped him write a song. It's gonna be on the new album.
translation.it: L'ho aiutato a scrivere una canzone che sarà nel nuovo album.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -It's no big deal though, you know.
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio. - Non è un granché.

translation.en: You know what? You're right. I don't believe you.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Hai ragione. Non ci credo.

translation.en: Oh, you hater.
Oh, you mad 'cause Brian McKnight made me his muse.
translation.it: Sei gelosa perché ho ispirato Brian McKnight.

translation.en: You know, Rob, there is one thing you forgot to do today.
translation.it: C'è una cosa che hai dimenticato di fare oggi, Rob.

translation.en: No, I'm pretty sure I did everything, or else we wouldn't be here right now.
translation.it: No, sono sicuro di aver fatto tutto, altrimenti ora non saremmo qui.

translation.en: Unh-unh. You forgot to check the numbers.
-Ah, the numbers, right, right. -Yeah, come on.
-Okay, here we go. -All right, so did we win?
translation.it: - Ok, ecco qua. - Allora? Abbiamo vinto?

translation.en: -Yes, we most certainly did. -Yes!
I just didn't pick the right numbers...
translation.it: Non ho scelto i numeri giusti...

translation.en: but I picked the right girl.
Oh, baby. You know what? There is always next month.
translation.it: Amore, sai una cosa? C'è sempre il mese prossimo.

translation.en: No, I don't have time next month.
translation.it: Il mese prossimo non avrò tempo.

translation.en: You are now looking at the new full-time English lit teacher over at Larkin Prep.
translation.it: Hai davanti il nuovo insegnante di inglese a tempo pieno del liceo Larkin.

translation.en: -Are you serious? Really? -Yeah.
Baby, that's amazing!
-That's amazing. -Yeah.
Ladies and gentlemen, it's my great pleasure to introduce
translation.it: Signore e signori, è con piacere che vi presento

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Robert Anderson as they enjoy their first dance together.
translation.it: i signori Anderson, che faranno il loro primo ballo.

translation.en: Baby, are you sure you still want to do this?
It is a really important moment.
You know, it's the centerpiece to the whole reception.
translation.it: È il momento clou della festa.

translation.en: Well, you missed a few lessons.
And I'm really sorry about that.
But I plan on making it up to you.
Where the hell did you learn that?
I found some time.
translation.it: Ho trovato un po' di tempo.

translation.en: Excuse me. This is a wedding. Why don't y'all get out here and dance?
translation.it: Scusate, questo è un matrimonio. Perché non venite a ballare con noi?

translation.en: Come on, that's what this dance floor is for. Yeah.
translation.it: Forza, la pista è fatta per questo. Sì.

translation.en: [Megan] What happened when you broke into the solo, though?
translation.it: Cos'è successo quando hai suonato l'assolo?

translation.en: So did you have fun?
Oh, it was all right.
All right?
We got married, Brian McKnight sang your favorite song.
translation.it: Ci siamo sposati e Brian McKnight ha cantato la tua canzone preferita.

translation.en: -That was incredible. -What more do you want?
translation.it: - È stato incredibile. - Cosa vuoi di più?

translation.en: Uh, well, you know. When we get to the room, I can show you.
translation.it: Lo sai. Te lo farò vedere quando andiamo in camera.

translation.en: You have no idea how long I've been waiting to hear that.
translation.it: Non sai da quanto tempo aspetto di sentirtelo dire.

translation.en: Mm, come on.
You know, let's just take the stairs.
-You sure? -Yeah.
Oh, you gonna try to cheat? Oh!
